text: Tyancyapaiki tu jyala dekhila apalya bolanyane bahakavu sakasila bahakava ani tyancyavara apale svara ani pyade cadhavuna ana, ani tyancya dhana ani santatimadhuna apalahi his'sa lava, ani tyanna (khote) vacana de. Tyancyasi jevadhi dekhila vacane (vayade) saitanace asatata, sarvacya sarva purna dagabaji ahe
